metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8365 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The smka_decode_frame function in libavcodec/smacker.c in FFmpeg before 2.6.5, 2.7.x before 2.7.3, and 2.8.x through 2.8.2 does not verify that the data size is consistent with the number of channels, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted Smacker data.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2016-03-31, no equivalent fix in libav ebarretto> as of 2018-09-27, no equivalent fix in libav

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
